entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 22. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
